name: Aquarius Backpackers Byron Bay
description:
RENOVATIONS 2025: Please note that Aquarius is undergoing major renovations. Our poolside area and beer garden will be closed until late Spring / early Summer 2025. Other communal spaces may also be under construction or modified during this time.

Experience Byron Bay at Aquarius Backpackers
Located on the iconic Lawson Street, Aquarius Backpackers is just 100 meters from Byron Bay’s world-famous Main Beach and steps from buzzing shops and restaurants. Whether you’re here to relax or connect, we’ve got you covered.
Lounge by the pool or enjoy a full line-up of free daily activities, including rooftop yoga, beach volleyball, karaoke, trivia nights, and paint & sip sessions. You’ll also have access to free high-speed WiFi, a brand new rooftop gym, ping-pong, PlayStation 5, pool table, fully equipped kitchen (surfboard hire available for an additional fee).
Aquarius offers Byron’s most spacious dorms—all with ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning—as well as a variety of room types to suit every traveler: mixed dorms, female-only dorms, private rooms, and luxury motel-style spa suites.

Important Information
- Guests must be 18+ with valid photo ID at check-in.
- Dorm beds are exclusively for guests aged 18–35. Those over 35 are welcome in private rooms.
- For group bookings of 10 or more, please contact us directly via email to groups@aquariusbyronbay.com.au
- Motel Suite and Spa Suite bookings include one reserved car space. 
- All other parking can be booked at check-in for a small daily fee (subject to availability).
- During peak periods (20th December – 10th January and Easter long weekend), a 25% deposit is required at the time of booking. Full payment is due one month before arrival. No refunds or changes allowed within one month of check-in.
- No check-ins or check-outs are available on December 25 or January 1.
- Roca, our Latin fusion restaurant & licensed bar, is open daily from 7am–10pm. In-house guests receive 15% off food and drinks. Please note some rooms may experience elevated noise levels during these hours.

groupInformation.terms: For groups that occupy a full dorm, there is a $250 security deposit to paid on arrival that will be refunded in full once the room is checked for damages and/or excess cleaning.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: Free cancellation until 21 days prior, after no refunds.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
-Must be over 18, bring valid photo id

- $250 bond per room

houseRules.notes:
RENOVATIONS 2025: Please note that Aquarius is undergoing major renovations. Our poolside area and beer garden will be closed until late Spring 2025. Other communal spaces may also be under construction during this time.

**** Easter Long Weekend and Christmas / New Years period (20th December - 10th January)****
Please book carefully as all bookings over these periods have a 30 DAY CANCELLATION POLICY.
25% deposit is required at time of booking and full payment will be taken one month prior to check-in.

Please book carefully.

IMPORTANT
- Guests must be 18+ with valid photo ID at check-in.
- Dorm beds are exclusively for guests aged 18–35. Those over 35 are welcome in private rooms.
- For group bookings of 10 or more, please contact us directly via email to groups@aquariusbyronbay.com.au
- Motel Suite and Spa Suite bookings include one reserved car space. 
- All other parking can be booked at check-in for a small daily fee (subject to availability).
- During peak periods (20th December – 10th January and Easter long weekend), a 25% deposit is required at the time of booking. Full payment is due one month before arrival. No refunds or changes allowed within one month of check-in.
- No check-ins or check-outs are available on December 25 or January 1.
- Roca, our Latin fusion restaurant & licensed bar, is open daily from 7am–10pm. In-house guests receive 15% off food and drinks. Please note some rooms may experience elevated noise levels during these hours.
- Latest check out is 10am - late fees apply. Be time conscious and vacate your room for a 10am check out.
